 8069: 
 8070: otp16649(N, Config) ->
 8071:     ?IPRINT("otp16649 -> entry with"
 8072:             "~n   N:      ~w"
 8073:             "~n   Config: ~p", [N, Config]),
 8074: 
 8075:     AgentNode   = ?config(agent_node, Config),
 8076:     ManagerNode = ?config(manager_node, Config),
 8077: 
 8078:     AInfo = rpc:call(AgentNode, snmpa, info, []),
 8079: 
 8080:     ?IPRINT("Agent Info: "
 8081:             "~n      ~p", [AInfo]),
 8082: 
 8083:     {value, {_, AgentRawTransports}} =
 8084:         lists:keysearch(agent_raw_transports, 1, Config),
 8085:     {value, {_, NetIF}}                =
 8086:         lists:keysearch(net_if, 1, AInfo),
 8087:     {value, {_, TIs}}                =
 8088:         lists:keysearch(transport_info, 1, NetIF),
 8089:     
 8090:     if (length(AgentRawTransports) =:= length(TIs)) ->
 8091:             ok;
 8092:        true ->
 8093:             ?IPRINT("Invalid transports: "
 8094:                     "~n   Number of raw transports: ~w"
 8095:                     "~n   Number of transports:     ~w",
 8096:                     [length(AgentRawTransports), length(TIs)]),
 8097:             exit({invalid_num_transports,
 8098:                   length(AgentRawTransports), length(TIs)})
 8099:     end,
 8100: 
 8101:     ?IPRINT("validate transports"),
 8102:     otp16649_validate_transports(AgentRawTransports, TIs),
 8103: 
 8104:     ?IPRINT("which req-responder port-no"),
 8105:     AgentReqPortNo = otp16649_which_req_port_no(TIs),
 8106: 
 8107:     ?IPRINT("which trap-sender port-no"),
 8108:     AgentTrapPortNo = otp16649_which_trap_port_no(TIs),
 8109: 
 8110:     ?IPRINT("(mgr) register user"),
 8111:     ok = otp16649_mgr_reg_user(ManagerNode),
 8112: 
 8113:     ?IPRINT("(mgr) register agent"),
 8114:     TargetBase = "otp16649-agent-",
 8115:     ReqTarget  = TargetBase ++ "req",
 8116:     TrapTarget = TargetBase ++ "trap",
 8117: 
 8118:     ok = otp16649_mgr_reg_agent(ManagerNode,
 8119:                                       ?config(ipfamily, Config),
 8120:                                       ?config(tdomain, Config),
 8121:                                       ReqTarget, AgentReqPortNo),
 8122:     ok = otp16649_mgr_reg_agent(ManagerNode,
 8123:                                       ?config(ipfamily, Config),
 8124:                                       ?config(tdomain, Config),
 8125:                                       TrapTarget, AgentTrapPortNo),
 8126: 
 8127:     ?IPRINT("(mgr) simple (sync) get request"),
 8128:     Oids     = [?sysObjectID_instance, ?sysDescr_instance, ?sysUpTime_instance],
 8129:     ok = case otp16649_mgr_get_req(ManagerNode, Oids) of
 8130:                    {ok, {noError, 0, ReplyOids}, _} ->
 8131:                        ?IPRINT("(mgr) simple (sync) successful reply: "
 8132:                                "~n      ~p", [ReplyOids]),
 8133:                        ok;
 8134:                    {ok, InvalidReply, _} ->
 8135:                        ?IPRINT("(mgr) simple (sync) invalid reply: "
 8136:                                "~n      ~p", [InvalidReply]),
 8137:                        ok;
 8138:                    {error, Reason} ->
 8139:                        ?IPRINT("(mgr) simple (sync) error: "
 8140:                                "~n      ~p", [Reason]),
 8141:                        error
 8142:                end,
 8143: 
 8144:     ?IPRINT("load TestTrap..."), 
 8145:     MibDir = ?config(mib_dir, Config),
 8146:     ok = otp16649_agent_load_mib(AgentNode, MibDir, "TestTrap"),
 8147: 
 8148:     ?IPRINT("(agent) send trap (testTrap2)"),
 8149:     ok = otp16649_agent_send_trap(AgentNode, testTrap2),
 8150: 
 8151:     TDomain = ?config(tdomain, Config),
 8152: 
 8153:     receive
 8154:         {handle_trap, From_v1, TrapTarget,
 8155:          {?system, 6, 1, _, Vbs_v1}}
 8156:         when is_pid(From_v1) andalso
 8157:              is_list(Vbs_v1) andalso
 8158:              (TDomain =:= transportDomainUdpIpv4) ->
 8159:             ?IPRINT("received expected (v1) handle trap callback message: "
 8160:                     "~n      ~p", [Vbs_v1]),
 8161:             ok
 8162: 
 8163:     after 5000 ->
 8164:             case TDomain of
 8165:                 transportDomainUdpIpv4 ->
 8166:                     ?IPRINT("TIMEOUT"),
 8167:                     exit(timeout);
 8168:                 transportDomainUdpIpv6 ->
 8169:                     ?IPRINT("expected timeout - "
 8170:                             "v1 trap's can only be sent on IPv4 domains"),
 8171:                     ok
 8172:             end
 8173:     end,
 8174: 
 8175: 
 8176:     ?IPRINT("load TestTrapv2..."), 
 8177:     ok = otp16649_agent_load_mib(AgentNode, MibDir, "TestTrapv2"),
 8178: 
 8179:     ?IPRINT("(agent) send trap (testTrapv22)"),
 8180:     ok = otp16649_agent_send_trap(AgentNode, testTrapv22),
 8181: 
 8182:     receive
 8183:         {handle_trap, From_v2, TrapTarget,
 8184:          {noError, 0, Vbs_v2}} when is_pid(From_v2) andalso
 8185:                                     is_list(Vbs_v2) ->
 8186:             ?IPRINT("received expected (v2) handle trap callback message: "
 8187:                     "~n      ~p", [Vbs_v2]),
 8188:             ok
 8189: 
 8190:     after 5000 ->
 8191:             ?IPRINT("TIMEOUT"),
 8192:             exit(timeout)
 8193:     end,
 8194: 
 8195:     ?IPRINT("done"),
 8196:     ok.
 8197: 
 8198: 
 8199: otp16649_init(N, AgentPreTransports, Config) ->
 8200:     ?IPRINT("otp16649_init -> entry with"
 8201:             "~n   N:                  ~w"
 8202:             "~n   AgentPreTransports: ~w"
 8203:             "~n   Config:             ~p", [N, AgentPreTransports, Config]),
 8204: 
 8205:     %% --
 8206:     %% Start nodes
 8207:     %%
 8208: 
 8209:     {ok, AgentPeer, AgentNode} = ?START_PEER("-agent"),
 8210:     {ok, ManagerPeer, ManagerNode} = ?START_PEER("-manager"),
 8211: 
 8212:     %% --
 8213:     %% Misc
 8214:     %%
 8215: 
 8216:     AgentHost         = ?HOSTNAME(AgentNode),
 8217:     ManagerHost       = ?HOSTNAME(ManagerNode),
 8218: 
 8219:     ?IPRINT("otp16649_init -> "
 8220:             "~n      AgentHost:   ~p"
 8221:             "~n      ManagerHost: ~p",
 8222:             [AgentHost, ManagerHost]),
 8223: 
 8224:     Host              = snmp_test_lib:hostname(), 
 8225:     Ip                = ?config(ip, Config),
 8226:     %% We should really "extract" the address from the hostnames,
 8227:     %% but because on some OSes (Ubuntu) adds 12.7.0.1.1 to its hosts file,
 8228:     %% this does not work. We want a "proper" address.
 8229:     %% Also, since both nodes (agent and manager) are both started locally,
 8230:     %% we can use 'Ip' for both!
 8231:     %% {ok, AgentIP}     = snmp_misc:ip(AgentHost),
 8232:     %% {ok, ManagerIP0}  = snmp_misc:ip(ManagerHost),
 8233:     AgentIP           = Ip,
 8234:     ManagerIP0        = Ip,
 8235:     ManagerIP         = tuple_to_list(ManagerIP0),
 8236:     ?IPRINT("otp16649_init -> "
 8237:             "~n      Host:       ~p"
 8238:             "~n      Ip:         ~p"
 8239:             "~n      AgentIP:    ~p"
 8240:             "~n      ManagerIP0: ~p"
 8241:             "~n      ManagerIP:  ~p",
 8242:             [Host, Ip, AgentIP, ManagerIP0, ManagerIP]),
 8243: 
 8244: 
 8245:     %% --
 8246:     %% Write agent config
 8247:     %% 
 8248: 
 8249:     AgentConfDir        = ?config(agent_conf_dir, Config),
 8250:     Vsns                = [v1,v2],
 8251:     TransportDomain     = ?config(tdomain, Config),
 8252:     F = fun({PortInfo, Kind}) ->
 8253:                 #{addr => {AgentIP, PortInfo}, kind => Kind};
 8254:            ({PortInfo, Kind, Opts}) ->
 8255:                 #{addr => {AgentIP, PortInfo}, kind => Kind, opts => Opts}
 8256:         end,
 8257:     AgentPreTransports2 = [F(T) || T <- AgentPreTransports],
 8258: 
 8259:     ?IPRINT("write agent config files"),
 8260:     ok = snmp_config:write_agent_snmp_files(
 8261:                  AgentConfDir, Vsns,
 8262:                  TransportDomain, {ManagerIP, ?MGR_PORT}, AgentPreTransports2,
 8263:                  "test"),
 8264: 
 8265:     ?IPRINT("start agent"),
 8266:     Config2 = start_agent([{host,          Host},
 8267: 			   {agent_peer,    AgentPeer},
 8268: 			   {agent_node,    AgentNode},
 8269: 			   {agent_host,    AgentHost},
 8270: 			   {agent_ip,      AgentIP},
 8271: 			   {manager_peer,  ManagerPeer},
 8272: 			   {manager_node,  ManagerNode},
 8273: 			   {manager_host,  ManagerHost},
 8274: 			   {manager_ip,    ManagerIP}|Config]),
 8275: 
 8276: 
 8277: 
 8278:     %% --
 8279:     %% Write manager config
 8280:     %%
 8281: 
 8282:     ?IPRINT("create manager dirs"),
 8283:     MgrTopDir  = ?config(manager_top_dir, Config),
 8284:     MgrDbDir   = filename:join(MgrTopDir,  "db/"),
 8285:     MgrConfDir = filename:join(MgrTopDir,  "conf/"),
 8286:     ok   = file:make_dir(MgrConfDir),
 8287:     MgrDbDir   = filename:join(MgrTopDir,  "db/"),
 8288:     ok   = file:make_dir(MgrDbDir),
 8289:     MgrLogDir  = filename:join(MgrTopDir,  "log/"),
 8290:     ok   = file:make_dir(MgrLogDir),
 8291: 
 8292:     ?IPRINT("write manager config files"),
 8293:     MgrTransports = [{TransportDomain, {ManagerIP0, ?MGR_PORT}}],
 8294:     ok = snmp_config:write_manager_snmp_files(
 8295:                  MgrConfDir,
 8296:                  MgrTransports,
 8297:                  ?MGR_MMS, ?MGR_ENGINE_ID),
 8298:     
 8299:     Config3 = [{manager_db_dir,   MgrDbDir},
 8300:                {manager_conf_dir, MgrConfDir},
 8301:                {manager_log_dir,  MgrLogDir} | Config2],
 8302:                
 8303:     ?IPRINT("start manager"),
 8304:     ok = start_manager(Config3),
 8305: 
 8306:     ?DBG("otp16649_init -> done when"
 8307:          "~n   Config2: ~p", [Config3]),
 8308:     [{agent_raw_transports, AgentPreTransports} | Config3].
 8309: 
 8310: 
 8311: otp16649_fin(N, Config) when is_integer(N) ->
 8312:     ?IPRINT("otp16649_fin -> entry with"
 8313:             "~n   N:      ~p"
 8314:             "~n   Config: ~p", [N, Config]),
 8315: 
 8316:     ManagerNode = ?config(manager_node, Config),
 8317: 
 8318:     %% -
 8319:     %% Stop agent (this is the nice way to do it, 
 8320:     %% so logs and files can be closed in the proper way).
 8321:     %%
 8322: 
 8323:     AgentTopSup = ?config(agent_sup, Config),
 8324:     stop_standalone_agent(AgentTopSup),
 8325: 
 8326: 
 8327:     %% -
 8328:     %% Stop manager
 8329:     %%
 8330: 
 8331:     stop_standalone_manager(ManagerNode),
 8332: 
 8333: 
 8334:     %%
 8335:     %% Stop the manager node
 8336:     %%
 8337: 
 8338:     ?DBG("otp16649_fin -> stop manager node", []),
 8339:     peer:stop(?config(manager_peer, Config)),
 8340: 
 8341: 
 8342:     %%
 8343:     %% Stop the agent node
 8344:     %%
 8345: 
 8346:     ?DBG("otp16649_fin -> stop agent node", []),
 8347:     peer:stop(?config(agent_peer, Config)),
 8348: 
 8349:     ?DBG("otp16649_fin -> done", []),
 8350:     Config1 = lists:keydelete(manager_node, 1, Config),
 8351:     lists:keydelete(agent_node, 1, Config1).
 8352: 
 8353: 
 8354: otp16649_validate_transports([], []) ->
 8355:     ok;
 8356: otp16649_validate_transports([AgentRawTransport|AgentRawTransports],
 8357:                              [TI|TIs]) ->
 8358:     ?IPRINT("validate transport:"
 8359:             "~n   AgentRawTransport: ~p"
 8360:             "~n   TI:                ~p",  [AgentRawTransport, TI]),
 8361:     otp16649_validate_transport(AgentRawTransport, TI),
 8362:     otp16649_validate_transports(AgentRawTransports, TIs).
 8363: 
 8364: otp16649_validate_transport({PortInfo, Kind}, #{taddress       := {_, PortNo},
 8365:                                                 transport_kind := Kind}) ->
 8366:     ?IPRINT("validate ~w transport:"
 8367:             "~n   PortNo:   ~w"
 8368:             "~n   PortInfo: ~p",  [Kind, PortNo, PortInfo]),
 8369:     otp16649_validate_port(PortInfo, PortNo);
 8370: otp16649_validate_transport({_, ConfKind}, #{taddress       := {_, PortNo},
 8371:                                              transport_kind := ActualKind}) ->
 8372:     exit({invalid_transport_kind, {PortNo, ConfKind, ActualKind}});
 8373: otp16649_validate_transport({PortInfo, Kind, _}, #{taddress       := {_, PortNo},
 8374:                                                    transport_kind := Kind}) ->
 8375:     ?IPRINT("validate ~w transport:"
 8376:             "~n   PortNo:   ~w"
 8377:             "~n   PortInfo: ~p",  [Kind, PortNo, PortInfo]),
 8378:     otp16649_validate_port(PortInfo, PortNo);
 8379: otp16649_validate_transport({_, ConfKind, _}, #{taddress       := {_, PortNo},
 8380:                                                 transport_kind := ActualKind}) ->
 8381:     exit({invalid_transport_kind, {PortNo, ConfKind, ActualKind}}).
 8382: 
 8383: otp16649_validate_port(PortNo, PortNo) when is_integer(PortNo) ->
 8384:     ok;
 8385: otp16649_validate_port(0, PortNo) when is_integer(PortNo) ->
 8386:     ok;
 8387: otp16649_validate_port(system, PortNo) when is_integer(PortNo) ->
 8388:     ok;
 8389: otp16649_validate_port(Range, PortNo) when is_tuple(Range) ->
 8390:     case otp16649_validate_port_range(Range, PortNo) of
 8391:         ok ->
 8392:             ok;
 8393:         error ->
 8394:             exit({invalid_transport_port_no, {Range, PortNo}})
 8395:     end;
 8396: otp16649_validate_port(Ranges, PortNo) when is_list(Ranges) ->
 8397:     case otp16649_validate_port_ranges(Ranges, PortNo) of
 8398:         ok ->
 8399:             ok;
 8400:         error ->
 8401:             exit({invalid_transport_port_no, {Ranges, PortNo}})
 8402:     end.
 8403: 
 8404: 
 8405: otp16649_validate_port_range({Min, Max}, PortNo)
 8406:   when is_integer(Min) andalso
 8407:        is_integer(Max) andalso
 8408:        is_integer(PortNo) andalso
 8409:        (Min =< PortNo) andalso
 8410:        (PortNo =< Max) ->
 8411:     ok;
 8412: otp16649_validate_port_range(_Range, _PortNo) ->
 8413:     error.
 8414: 
 8415: otp16649_validate_port_ranges([], _PortNo) ->
 8416:     error;
 8417: otp16649_validate_port_ranges([PortNo|_], PortNo) when is_integer(PortNo) ->
 8418:     ok;
 8419: otp16649_validate_port_ranges([Range|Ranges], PortNo) when is_tuple(Range) ->
 8420:     case otp16649_validate_port_range(Range, PortNo) of
 8421:         ok ->
 8422:             ok;
 8423:         error ->
 8424:             otp16649_validate_port_ranges(Ranges, PortNo)
 8425:     end;
 8426: otp16649_validate_port_ranges([_|Ranges], PortNo) ->
 8427:     otp16649_validate_port_ranges(Ranges, PortNo).
 8428: 
 8429: 
 8430: otp16649_which_req_port_no(TIs) ->
 8431:     ?IPRINT("otp16649_which_req_port_no -> entry with"
 8432:             "~n      TIs: ~p", [TIs]),
 8433:     otp16649_which_port_no(TIs, req_responder).
 8434: 
 8435: otp16649_which_trap_port_no(TIs) ->
 8436:     ?IPRINT("otp16649_which_trap_port_no -> entry with"
 8437:             "~n      TIs: ~p", [TIs]),
 8438:     otp16649_which_port_no(TIs, trap_sender).
 8439: 
 8440: otp16649_which_port_no([], Kind) ->
 8441:     exit({no_transport_port_no, Kind});
 8442: otp16649_which_port_no([#{taddress       := {_, PortNo},
 8443:                           transport_kind := Kind}|_], Kind) ->
 8444:     PortNo;
 8445: otp16649_which_port_no([_|TIs], Kind) ->
 8446:     otp16649_which_port_no(TIs, Kind).
 8447:

 8451:              [otp16649, snmp_otp16649_user, self()]).
 8452: 
 8453: otp16649_mgr_reg_agent(Node, IPFam, TDomain, Target, PortNo) ->
 8454:     ?IPRINT("otp16649_mgr_reg_agent -> entry with"
 8455:             "~n      Node:    ~p"
 8456:             "~n      IPFam:   ~p"
 8457:             "~n      TDomain: ~p"
 8458:             "~n      Target:  ~p"
 8459:             "~n      PortNo:  ~p",
 8460:             [Node, IPFam, TDomain, Target, PortNo]),
 8461:     Localhost = ?LOCALHOST(IPFam),
 8462:     Version   = v1,
 8463:     EngineId  = "agentEngine",
 8464:     ?IPRINT("otp16649_mgr_reg_agent -> register agent:"
 8465:             "~n      Target:   ~p"
 8466:             "~n      Address:  ~p"
 8467:             "~n      Port:     ~p"
 8468:             "~n      Version:  ~p"
 8469:             "~n      TDomain:  ~p"
 8470:             "~n      EngineId: ~p",
 8471:             [Target, Localhost, PortNo, Version, TDomain, EngineId]),    
 8472:     Config     = [{address,   Localhost},
 8473:                   {port,      PortNo},
 8474:                   {version,   Version},
 8475:                   {tdomain,   TDomain},
 8476:                   {engine_id, EngineId}],
 8477:     rpc:call(Node, snmpm, register_agent,
 8478:               [otp16649, Target, Config]).
 8479:

 8527: start_agent(Config) ->

 8529: 
 8530: start_agent(Config, Opts) ->
 8531: 
 8532:     %% Directories
 8533:     ConfDir     = ?config(agent_conf_dir,     Config),
 8534:     DbDir       = ?config(agent_db_dir,       Config),
 8535:     LogDir      = ?config(agent_log_dir,      Config),
 8536:     InetBackend = ?config(socket_create_opts, Config),
 8537:  
 8538:     Vsns = [v1], 
 8539: 
 8540:     AgentConfig = process_agent_options(ConfDir, DbDir, LogDir, Vsns,
 8541:                                         InetBackend, Opts),
 8542:     
 8543:     %% Nodes
 8544:     AgentNode = ?config(agent_node, Config),
 8545:     
 8546:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 8547: 
 8548:     {ok, AgentTopSup} = start_standalone_agent(AgentNode, AgentConfig),
 8549: 
 8550:     [{agent_sup, AgentTopSup} | Config].
 8551:     
 8552: 
 8553: process_agent_options(ConfDir, DbDir, LogDir, Vsns, InetBackend, Opts) ->
 8554:     ?IPRINT("process_agent_options ->"
 8555:             "~n   ConfDir:     ~p"
 8556:             "~n   DbDir:       ~p"
 8557:             "~n   LogDir:      ~p"
 8558:             "~n   Vsns:        ~p"
 8559:             "~n   InetBackend: ~p"
 8560:             "~n   Opts:        ~p",
 8561:             [ConfDir, DbDir, LogDir, Vsns, InetBackend, Opts]),
 8562:     Defaults = 
 8563: 	[{agent_type,      master},
 8564: 	 {agent_verbosity, trace},
 8565: 	 {priority,        normal},
 8566: 	 {versions,        Vsns},
 8567: 	 {db_dir,          DbDir},
 8568: 	 {mib_storage,     ets},
 8569: 	 {local_db, [{repair,    true},
 8570: 		     {auto_save, 5000},
 8571: 		     {verbosity, log}]},
 8572: 	 {error_report_module, snmpa_error_logger},
 8573: 	 {config, [{dir,        ConfDir},
 8574: 		   {force_load, true},
 8575: 		   {verbosity,  trace}]},
 8576: 	 {multi_threaded, true},
 8577: 	 {mib_server, [{mibentry_override,  false},
 8578: 		       {trapentry_override, false},
 8579: 		       {verbosity,          info}]},
 8580: 	 {target_cache,   [{verbosity,info}]},
 8581: 	 {symbolic_store, [{verbosity,log}]},
 8582: 	 {note_store, [{timeout,30000}, {verbosity,log}]},
 8583: 	 {net_if, [{module,    snmpa_net_if},
 8584: 		   {verbosity, trace},
 8585: 		   {options,   InetBackend ++ [{bind_to,   false},
 8586:                                                {no_reuse,  false},
 8587:                                                {req_limit, infinity}]}]},
 8588: 	 {audit_trail_log, [{type,   read_write},
 8589: 			    {dir,    LogDir},
 8590: 			    {size,   {10240,20}},
 8591: 			    {repair, true},
 8592: 			    {seqno,  true}]}],
 8593:     
 8594:     process_options(Defaults, Opts).
 8595: 
 8596: process_options(Defaults, _Opts) ->
 8597:     %% process_options(Defaults, Opts, []).
 8598:     Defaults.
 8599: 
 8600: 
 8601: start_standalone_agent(Node, Config)  ->
 8602:     rpc:call(Node, ?MODULE, start_standalone_agent, [Config]).
 8603: 
 8604: start_standalone_agent(Config)  ->
 8605:     case snmpa_supervisor:start_link(normal, Config) of
 8606:         {ok, AgentTopSup} ->
 8607:             unlink(AgentTopSup),
 8608:             {ok, AgentTopSup};
 8609:         {error, {already_started, AgentTopSup}} ->
 8610:             {ok, AgentTopSup};
 8611:         {error, _} = ERROR ->
 8612:             ERROR
 8613:     end.
 8614: 
 8615: stop_standalone_agent(Pid) when (node(Pid) =/= node()) ->
 8616:     MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 8617:     rpc:call(node(Pid), ?MODULE, stop_standalone_agent, [Pid]),
 8618:     receive
 8619: 	{'DOWN', MRef, process, Pid, _Info} ->
 8620: 	    ?DBG("received expected DOWN message "
 8621: 		 "regarding snmp agent supervisor: "
 8622: 		 "~n   Info: ~p", [_Info]),
 8623: 	    ok
 8624:     after 5000 ->
 8625: 	    ?DBG("no DOWN message "
 8626: 		 "regarding snmp agent supervisor within time", []),
 8627: 	    ok
 8628:     end;
 8629: stop_standalone_agent(Pid) ->
 8630:     ?DBG("attempting to terminate agent top-supervisor: ~p", [Pid]),
 8631:     nkill(Pid, kill).
 8632: 
 8633: 
 8634: start_manager(Config) ->
 8635:     Node    = ?config(manager_node, Config),
 8636:     ConfDir = ?config(manager_conf_dir, Config),
 8637:     DbDir   = ?config(manager_db_dir, Config),
 8638: 
 8639:     Opts = [{server, [{verbosity, trace}]},
 8640: 	    {net_if, [{verbosity, trace}]},
 8641: 	    {note_store, [{verbosity, trace}]},
 8642: 	    {config, [{verbosity, trace}, {dir, ConfDir}, {db_dir, DbDir}]}],
 8643:     ok = start_standalone_manager(Node, Opts).
 8644: 
 8645: 
 8646: start_standalone_manager(Node, Config) ->
 8647:     rpc:call(Node, ?MODULE, start_standalone_manager, [Config]).
 8648: 
 8649: start_standalone_manager(Config)  ->
 8650:     snmpm:start(Config).
 8651: 
 8652: 
 8653: stop_standalone_manager(Node) when (Node =/= node()) ->
 8654:     rpc:call(Node, snmpm, stop, []);
 8655: stop_standalone_manager(_) ->
 8656:     snmpm:stop().
 8657: 
 8658: 
 8659: nkill(Pid, Reason) ->
 8660:     nkill(Pid, Reason, 10).
 8661: 
 8662: nkill(Pid, Reason, N) when N > 0 ->
 8663:     case (catch erlang:process_info(Pid)) of
 8664: 	Info when is_list(Info) ->
 8665: 	    ?DBG("Info for process to kill: "
 8666: 		 "~n   Info: ~p", [Info]),
 8667: 	    exit(Pid, Reason),
 8668: 	    ?SLEEP(1000),
 8669: 	    nkill(Pid, Reason, N-1);
 8670: 	_ ->
 8671: 	    ?DBG("No process info => already dead?", []),
 8672: 	    ok
 8673:     end.
 8674:

 8677: %% Slogan: info test
 8678: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 8679: 
 8680: info_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 8681:     ?P(info_test), 
 8682:     init_case(Config),
 8683: 
 8684:     load_master("OLD-SNMPEA-MIB"),
 8685:     init_old(),
 8686:     try_test(do_info, [node()]),
 8687:     unload_master("OLD-SNMPEA-MIB").
 8688:     
 8689: do_info(MaNode) ->
 8690:     Info = rpc:call(MaNode, snmpa, info, []),
 8691:     ?DBG("info_test1 -> Info: ~n~p", [Info]),
 8692:     Keys = [vsns, 
 8693: 	    stats_counters, 
 8694: 	    {agent, [process_memory, db_memory]}, 
 8695: 	    {net_if, [process_memory, transport_info, reqs]}, 
 8696: 	    {note_store, [process_memory, db_memory]}, 
 8697: 	    {symbolic_store, [process_memory, db_memory]}, 
 8698: 	    {local_db, [process_memory, db_memory]}, 
 8699: 	    {mib_server, [process_memory, 
 8700: 			  loaded_mibs, 
 8701: 			  subagents, 
 8702: 			  tree_size_bytes, 
 8703: 			  db_memory]}], 
 8704:     verify_info(Info, Keys),
 8705:     ok.
 8706: 
 8707: verify_info([], []) ->
 8708:     ok;
 8709: verify_info([], Keys) ->
 8710:     ?FAIL({remaining_info_keys, Keys});
 8711: verify_info(Info0, [Key|Keys]) ->
 8712:     Info = verify_info1(Info0, Key),
 8713:     verify_info(Info, Keys).
 8714: 
 8715: verify_info1(Info0, Key) when is_atom(Key) ->
 8716:     case lists:keydelete(Key, 1, Info0) of
 8717: 	Info0 ->
 8718: 	    ?FAIL({missing_info, Key});
 8719: 	Info ->
 8720: 	    Info
 8721:     end;
 8722: verify_info1(Info0, {Key, SubKeys}) when is_atom(Key) andalso is_list(SubKeys) ->
 8723:     case lists:keysearch(Key, 1, Info0) of
 8724: 	false ->
 8725: 	    ?FAIL({missing_info, Key});	    
 8726: 	{value, {Key, SubInfo}} ->
 8727: 	    case verify_subinfo(SubInfo, SubKeys) of
 8728: 		ok ->
 8729: 		    lists:keydelete(Key, 1, Info0);
 8730: 		{error, MissingSubKeyOrKeys} ->
 8731: 		    ?FAIL({missing_info, {Key, MissingSubKeyOrKeys}})
 8732: 	    end
 8733:     end.
 8734: 
 8735: verify_subinfo(_, []) ->
 8736:     ok;
 8737: verify_subinfo([], Keys) ->
 8738:     {error, Keys};
 8739: verify_subinfo(Info0, [Key|Keys]) ->
 8740:     case lists:keydelete(Key, 1, Info0) of
 8741: 	Info0 ->
 8742: 	    {error, Key};
 8743: 	Info ->
 8744: 	    verify_subinfo(Info, Keys)
 8745:     end.
 8746:    
 8747: %% Index String - string used in index
 8748: is(S) -> [length(S) | S].
 8749:

 8760:     ?ALIB:try_test(?MODULE, Func, A, Opts).

 8840: display_log(Config) ->
 8841:     case lists:keysearch(agent_log_dir, 1, Config) of
 8842: 	{value, {_, Dir}} ->
 8843: 	    case lists:keysearch(snmp_master, 1, Config) of
 8844: 		{value, {_, Node}} ->
 8845: 		    LogDir  = Dir, 
 8846: 		    Mibs    = [], 
 8847: 		    OutFile = join(LogDir, "snmpa_log.txt"), 
 8848: 		    ?IPRINT("~n"
 8849:                             "========================="
 8850:                             "  < Audit Trail Log >  "
 8851:                             "========================="
 8852:                             "~n"),
 8853: 		    rcall(Node, snmpa, log_to_txt, [LogDir, Mibs, OutFile]),
 8854: 		    rcall(Node, snmpa, log_to_io, [LogDir, Mibs]),
 8855: 		    ?IPRINT("~n"
 8856:                             "========================="
 8857:                             " < / Audit Trail Log > "
 8858:                             "========================="
 8859:                             "~n");
 8860: 		false ->
 8861: 		    ?IPRINT("display_log -> no agent node found"),
 8862: 		    ok
 8863: 	    end;
 8864: 	false ->
 8865: 	    ?IPRINT("display_log -> no agent log dir found: "
 8866:                     "~n   ~p", [Config]),
 8867: 	    ok
 8868:     end.

 8873: display_memory_usage() ->
 8874:     Info  = snmpa:info(snmp_master_agent),
 8875:     AMU   = display_agent_memory_usage(Info),
 8876:     NIMU  = display_net_if_memory_usage(Info),
 8877:     NSMU  = display_note_store_memory_usage(Info),
 8878:     SSMU  = display_symbolic_store_memory_usage(Info),
 8879:     LDBMU = display_local_db_memory_usage(Info),
 8880:     MSMU  = display_mib_server_memory_usage(Info),
 8881:     ?NPRINT("Memory usage: ~n" ++ AMU ++ NIMU ++ NSMU ++ SSMU ++ LDBMU ++ MSMU),
 8882:     ok.
 8883: 
 8884: display_agent_memory_usage(Info) ->
 8885:     AgentInfo = lists_key1search(agent, Info),
 8886:     ProcMem   = 
 8887: 	lists_key1search([process_memory,master_agent], AgentInfo),
 8888:     WProcMem  = 
 8889: 	lists_key1search([process_memory,worker], AgentInfo),
 8890:     SWProcMem = 
 8891: 	lists_key1search([process_memory,set_worker], AgentInfo),
 8892:     TabSize  = 
 8893: 	lists_key1search([db_memory,agent], AgentInfo),
 8894:     CCSize   = 
 8895: 	lists_key1search([db_memory,community_cache], AgentInfo),
 8896:     VacmSize = 
 8897: 	lists_key1search([db_memory,vacm], AgentInfo),
 8898:     ?F("  Agent memory usage: "
 8899:        "~n    Master process memory size:     ~p"
 8900:        "~n    Worker process memory size:     ~p"
 8901:        "~n    Set-worker process memory size: ~p"
 8902:        "~n    Agent tab size:                 ~p"
 8903:        "~n    Community cache size:           ~p"
 8904:        "~n    Vacm tab size:                  ~p"
 8905:        "~n",
 8906:        [ProcMem, WProcMem, SWProcMem, 
 8907:         TabSize, CCSize, VacmSize]).
 8908: 
 8909: display_net_if_memory_usage(Info) ->
 8910:     NiInfo     = lists_key1search(net_if, Info),
 8911:     ProcMem    = lists_key1search(process_memory, NiInfo),
 8912:     ?F("  Net if memory usage: "
 8913:        "~n    Process memory size:            ~p"
 8914:        "~n", [ProcMem]).
 8915: 
 8916: display_note_store_memory_usage(Info) ->
 8917:     NsInfo     = lists_key1search(note_store, Info),
 8918:     ProcMem    = lists_key1search([process_memory,notes], NsInfo),
 8919:     ProcTmrMem = lists_key1search([process_memory,timer], NsInfo),
 8920:     TabSize    = lists_key1search([db_memory,notes],      NsInfo),
 8921:     ?F("  Note store memory usage: "
 8922:        "~n    Notes process memory size:      ~p"
 8923:        "~n    Timer process memory size:      ~p"
 8924:        "~n    Notes tab size:                 ~p"
 8925:        "~n",
 8926:        [ProcMem, ProcTmrMem, TabSize]).
 8927:  
 8928:   display_symbolic_store_memory_usage(Info) -> 
 8929:     SsInfo  = lists_key1search(symbolic_store, Info),
 8930:     ProcMem = lists_key1search(process_memory, SsInfo),
 8931:     DbMem   = lists_key1search(db_memory,      SsInfo),
 8932:     ?F("  Symbolic store memory usage: "
 8933:        "~n    Process memory size:            ~p"
 8934:        "~n    DB size:                        ~p"
 8935:        "~n",
 8936:        [ProcMem, DbMem]).
 8937:     
 8938: display_local_db_memory_usage(Info) ->
 8939:     LdInfo   = lists_key1search(local_db, Info),
 8940:     ProcMem  = lists_key1search(process_memory,   LdInfo),
 8941:     EtsSize  = lists_key1search([db_memory,ets],  LdInfo),
 8942:     DetsSize = lists_key1search([db_memory,dets], LdInfo),
 8943:     ?F("  Local DB memory usage: "
 8944:        "~n    Process memory size:            ~p"
 8945:        "~n    DB [ets] size:                  ~p"
 8946:        "~n    DB [dets] size:                 ~p"
 8947:        "~n",
 8948:        [ProcMem, EtsSize, DetsSize]).
 8949: 
 8950: display_mib_server_memory_usage(Info) ->
 8951:     MibInfo    = lists_key1search(mib_server, Info),
 8952:     ProcMem    = lists_key1search(process_memory,   MibInfo),
 8953:     TreeSize   = lists_key1search(tree_size_bytes,  MibInfo),
 8954:     MibDbSize  = lists_key1search([db_memory,mib],  MibInfo),
 8955:     NodeDbSize = lists_key1search([db_memory,node], MibInfo),
 8956:     TreeDbSize = lists_key1search([db_memory,tree], MibInfo),
 8957:     ?F("  MIB server memory usage: "
 8958:        "~n    Process memory size:            ~p"
 8959:        "~n    Tree size:                      ~p"
 8960:        "~n    Mib db size:                    ~p"
 8961:        "~n    Node db size:                   ~p"
 8962:        "~n    Tree db size:                   ~p"
 8963:        "~n", 
 8964:        [ProcMem, TreeSize, MibDbSize, NodeDbSize, TreeDbSize]).
 8965:     
 8966: lists_key1search([], Res) ->
 8967:     Res;
 8968: lists_key1search([Key|Keys], List) when is_atom(Key) andalso is_list(List) ->
 8969:     case lists:keysearch(Key, 1, List) of
 8970: 	{value, {Key, Val}} ->
 8971: 	    lists_key1search(Keys, Val);
 8972: 	false ->
 8973: 	    undefined
 8974:     end;
 8975: lists_key1search(Key, List) when is_atom(Key) ->
 8976:     case lists:keysearch(Key, 1, List) of
 8977: 	{value, {Key, Val}} ->
 8978: 	    Val;
 8979: 	false ->
 8980: 	    undefined
 8981:     end.
 8982: 
 8983: 
 8984: %% ------
 8985: 
 8986: init_v1_agent(Config) -> 
 8987:     %% -- 
 8988:     %% Start nodes
 8989:     %%
 8990:     {ok, AgentPeer, AgentNode} = ?START_PEER("-agent"),
 8991: 
 8992:     %% We don't use a manager in this test but the (common) config 
 8993:     %% function takes an argument that is derived from this
 8994:     {ok, ManagerPeer, ManagerNode} = ?START_PEER("-manager"),
 8995: 
 8996:     %% -- 
 8997:     %% Mnesia init
 8998:     %% 
 8999: 
 9000:     AgentDbDir = ?config(agent_db_dir, Config),
 9001:     AgentMnesiaDir = join([AgentDbDir, "mnesia"]),
 9002:     mnesia_init(AgentNode, AgentMnesiaDir),
 9003: 
 9004:     mnesia_create_schema(AgentNode, [AgentNode]),
 9005: 
 9006:     mnesia_start(AgentNode),
 9007: 
 9008:     %% --
 9009:     %% Host & IP
 9010:     %% 
 9011: 
 9012:     AgentHost   = ?HOSTNAME(AgentNode),
 9013:     ManagerHost = ?HOSTNAME(ManagerNode),
 9014: 
 9015:     Host              = snmp_test_lib:hostname(), 
 9016:     IpFamily          = config_ipfamily(Config),
 9017:     Ip                = ?LOCALHOST(IpFamily),
 9018:     {ok, AgentIP0}    = snmp_misc:ip(AgentHost, IpFamily),
 9019:     AgentIP           = tuple_to_list(AgentIP0), 
 9020:     {ok, ManagerIP0}  = snmp_misc:ip(ManagerHost, IpFamily),
 9021:     ManagerIP         = tuple_to_list(ManagerIP0),
 9022: 
 9023: 
 9024:     %% --
 9025:     %% Write agent config
 9026:     %% 
 9027: 
 9028:     Vsns           = [v1], 
 9029:     ManagerConfDir = ?config(manager_top_dir, Config),
 9030:     AgentConfDir   = ?config(agent_conf_dir, Config),
 9031:     AgentTopDir    = ?config(agent_top_dir, Config),
 9032:     AgentBkpDir1   = join([AgentTopDir, backup1]),
 9033:     AgentBkpDir2   = join([AgentTopDir, backup2]),
 9034:     ok = file:make_dir(AgentBkpDir1),
 9035:     ok = file:make_dir(AgentBkpDir2),
 9036:     AgentBkpDirs = [AgentBkpDir1, AgentBkpDir2], 
 9037:     config(Vsns, ManagerConfDir, AgentConfDir, ManagerIP, AgentIP, IpFamily),
 9038: 
 9039: 
 9040:     %% --
 9041:     %% Start the agent
 9042:     %% 
 9043: 
 9044:     Config2 = start_agent([{host,              Host}, 
 9045: 			   {ip,                Ip},
 9046: 			   {agent_peer,        AgentPeer},
 9047: 			   {agent_node,        AgentNode}, 
 9048: 			   {agent_host,        AgentHost}, 
 9049: 			   {agent_ip,          AgentIP}, 
 9050: 			   {agent_backup_dirs, AgentBkpDirs},
 9051:                            
 9052:                            %% We need this here since without it
 9053:                            %% fin_v1_agent will not be able to stop!
 9054:                            {manager_peer, ManagerPeer},
 9055:                            {manager_node, ManagerNode}|Config]),
 9056: 
 9057:     %% -- 
 9058:     %% Create watchdog 
 9059:     %% 
 9060: 
 9061:     wd_start(1, Config2).
 9062: 
 9063: fin_v1_agent(Config) ->
 9064:     AgentNode   = ?config(agent_node, Config),
 9065: 
 9066:     %% -
 9067:     %% Stop agent (this is the nice way to do it, 
 9068:     %% so logs and files can be closed in the proper way).
 9069:     %% 
 9070: 
 9071:     AgentSup = ?config(agent_sup, Config),
 9072:     stop_standalone_agent(AgentSup), 
 9073: 
 9074:     %% - 
 9075:     %% Stop mnesia
 9076:     %% 
 9077:     mnesia_stop(AgentNode),
 9078: 
 9079: 
 9080:     %% - 
 9081:     %% Stop the agent node
 9082:     %%
 9083:     peer:stop(?config(agent_peer, Config)),
 9084: 
 9085: 
 9086:     %%     SubAgentNode = ?config(sub_agent_node, Config),
 9087:     %%     stop_node(SubAgentNode),
 9088: 
 9089: 
 9090:     %% - 
 9091:     %% Stop the manager node
 9092:     %% 
 9093:     peer:stop(?config(manager_peer, Config)),
 9094: 
 9095:     wd_stop(Config).
 9096: 
 9097: 
 9098: config_ipfamily(Config) ->
 9099:     case ?config(ipfamily, Config) of
 9100: 	undefined ->
 9101: 	    inet;
 9102: 	Value ->
 9103: 	    Value
 9104:     end.
 9105: 
 9106: 
 9107: %% ------
 9108: 
 9109: join(Parts) ->
 9110:     filename:join(Parts).
 9111: 
 9112: join(Dir, File) ->
 9113:     filename:join(Dir, File).
 9114: 
 9115: 
 9116: %% ------
 9117: 
 9118: rcall(Node, Mod, Func, Args) ->
 9119:     case rpc:call(Node, Mod, Func, Args) of
 9120: 	{badrpc, nodedown} ->
 9121: 	    ?FAIL({rpc_failure, Node});
 9122: 	Else ->
 9123: 	    Else
 9124:     end.
